title: why can eve miss her initial Q and still use her hate spikes??????????????????
body: i thought you had to land you Q to use hate spikes on your target and those around them..if thats not the case then what the hell is the point of her initial Q? that shit is misleading. i get the charm cast and flash so eve misses her Q but she uses hate spikes and charms me anyways. what type of bullshit drugs are riot employees on?

replies.body:
Evelynn does not need to land her first cast of Hate Spike to recast it 3 more times.

Evelynn DOES need to land her first cast of Hate Spike to apply a debuff to the enemy hit that causes them to take flat bonus magic damage from the next 3 instances of damage Evelynn deals, meaning that missing her initial Hate Spike reduces her damage output. Also, if she somehow misses her first Hate Spike on a monster camp, she will not get the cooldown refund.

Also, if she somehow misses her first Hate Spike on a monster camp, she will not get the cooldown refund.

Exactly.

By looking at the numbers right here :

**DART DAMAGE:
25 / 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 (+ 30% AP)**

**BONUS DAMAGE:
10 / 20 / 30 / 40 / 50 (+ 25% AP)**

**SPIKE DAMAGE:
25 / 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 (+ 30% AP)**

Missing her initial Q cast reduces the spell's damage output by :

25 / 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 (+ 30% AP) + (3 x 10 / 20 / 30 / 40 / 50 (+ 25% AP)) = **55 / 90 / 125 / 160 / 195 (+115% AP) damage**.

Her 3 re-casts, without the bonus damage, deal **75 / 90 / 105 / 120 / 155 (+90% AP) damage**,
At every level but level 1,  it quite literally cuts her damage in half, and gets progressively stronger, punishing her more and more for missing it.

Her Q is only for her w and to reduce the overall CD on her q. 

I mean did you forget eve's signiture spell was always her spikes?
